Odoo

class Odoo (View source)

Odoo Class Used to connect with the odoo.com ERP.

Properties

protected string $ripcord RipCord Class - XML-RPC library for PHP - https://github.com/poef/ripcord
$common Common client
$object Object client
protected $uid User identifier used in authenticated calls instead of the login.

Collection search(string $model)

By default, retrieve the ids based on a previous passed condition.

If no condition, all are retrieved.

Parameters

Return Value

Collection List of ids

at line 300
Collection fieldsOf(string $model)

Retrieve all model structure fields.

the most interesting items for a human user are string (the field's label), help (a help text if available) and type (to know which values to expect, or to send when updating a record)

Parameters

string $model

Return Value
